title: Trade in enslaved people map - cause

content.question: Which of the following most directly contributed to the major pattern depicted on the map?

choices.label: The growth of the fur trade in the North American colonies
The spread of ideas associated with the European Enlightenment
Demand for crops produced in the Americas
Africansâ€™ adaptation to the culture of the Western Hemisphere

content.answer: Demand for crops produced in the Americas

topic.text: 1.5: Labor, Slavery, and Caste in the Spanish Colonial System
